text: Brent Carver (November 17, 1951 â€“ August 4, 2020) was a Canadian actor. He was best known for his roles on Broadway in Parade as Leo Frank and Kiss of the Spider Woman as Molina. He won the Tony Award for Best Leading Actor in a Musical in 1993. Carver was born in Cranbrook, British Columbia. He died on August 4, 2020 at the age of 68 at home in Cranbrook. ==References== Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:People from Cranbrook, British Columbia Category:Actors from British Columbia
title: Brent Carver
